About

Hello! I'm Michael, a Software Engineer based out of Melbourne, FL.

I was born and raised in Columbus, OH and graduated from The Ohio State University with a bachelor's degree in computer science and engineering. I enjoy working on all different types of projects, but have a passion for web and mobile application development (front-end and back-end).

Work Experience

March 2022 - Present

WellHive
Software Engineer

Maintaining and evolving the cloud infrastructure of the company in AWS GovCloud. Working collaboratively with other engineering teams responsible for building applications and services that sit atop the cloud infrastructure.

We work with modern Infrastructure as Code tools and technologies such as Pulumi with TypeScript.

June 2018 - March 2022

L3Harris Technologies
Software Engineer

Worked on the design and development of the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) Common Support Services - Weather (CSS-Wx) NextGen program. CSS-Wx will be the single provider of weather data, products, and imagery within the National Airspace System (NAS).

Technical lead and Scrum Master of a team of senior software engineers responsible for security, infrastructure, and the maintenance, monitoring and control user interface.

May 2017 - May 2018

American Chemical Society
Application Software Intern

Worked as part of the application development and business solutions team. Designed and developed a new time tracking web application for the company, fix reported bugs and added new requested features to various projects primarily using Java and Spring.

Success during this internship led to an offer to continue work during the 2017-2018 school year as well as a full-time offer after graduation.

Aug 2016 - May 2018

The Ohio State University
Java Consultant

Assisted Computer Science students with coursework to help achieve well-written code and a clear understanding of concepts and best practices. Mainly focused in assisting with Java, but also had cases in which I assisted with C and C++.

Coursework I assisted with included Introduction to Java, Software Components, and Software Development and Design.

Education

2015 - 2018

Bachelors Degree
Compute Science and Engineering

The Ohio State University

Received my Bachelor of Science Degree in Computer Science and Engineering with a specialization in Software Engineering. My studies mainly focused on application develpoment, software engineering techniques and principles and the software development life cycle (SDLC).
